His role has often been described as providing "adult supervision" at a company whose young co-founders like to do things in unconventional ways. Eric Schmidt has a great track record and has really steered Google Inc. to great success, said Gartner analyst Ray Valdes. new revenue." Wedbush's Lou Kerner said the new management structure could prove more nimble than the troika of Eric Schmidt , Page and Sergey Brin , which has been in place for the last decade. What I do think Facebook has shown Google Inc. is that they're moving too slow, Lou Kerner said. "Facebook is moving at the speed of light and Google Inc. isn't. "Having three people running the company, making the decisions, was slowing it down," he added.
